item.aviator_dream.douglas_dc1.descripti: A Prototype airliner built by Douglas Aircraft it was continue its journey as DC-2 and DC-3, it was a reliable fast and able to carry a lot but it was a little bit unstable.
item.aviator_dream.douglas_dc2.descripti: an Production version of DC-1 it fitted with more seat and more powerful engines as well as some modification to make it more stable.
item.aviator_dream.douglas_c47.descripti: A military version of DC-3 focused on Cargo transport it was refitted with 14cylinders engine, this thing can carry more than its previous type.
item.aviator_dream.lockheed_l1049g.descr: An airliner designed for long hual and high speed.
item.aviator_dream.fokker_fviib3m.descri: An upgraded version of F.VIIA with 3 more engines added to it for more reliability.
item.aviator_dream.fokker_fviia.descript: A wooden airliner fitted with one 7cylinders engine it slow and underpowered but best option for starter airline owner backthen.
item.aviator_dream.dehavilland_dh106.des:
Worlds very first jet passenger airliner which got 4 centrifual flow jet engine.
It fly faster than other propeller driven aircrafts but also consume more fuel.
 + This one got reinforced fuselage so it will not repeat its history again.
item.aviator_dream.toyota_stout_k100.des: A Light truck fitted with Inline 4 engine. cheap and reliable this thing work for you as long as you feed it enough fuel, make sure to not drive it too fast.
item.aviator_dream.test.description: A test entity used as base for ground vehicle.
